mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_info (user_id, line_id, play_date, quantity, price, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{lineId}, #{playDate}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS orderId, r.name AS lineName, r.image AS image, o.play_date AS playDate, o.quantity AS quantity, o.price AS price, o.status AS status FROM order_info o LEFT JOIN route_line r ON o.line_id = r.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.id DESC
